titleStmt.title: Atlas minimus, or, A book of geography shewing all the empires, monarchies, kingdomes, regions, dominions, principalities and countries in the whole world / by John Seller ...
titleStmt.author: Seller, John, fl. 1658-1698.

biblFull.extent: [3], 48 p., [54] leaves of plates : ill., 54 maps.

publicationStmt.publisher: And are sold [by John Seller] at his house ... in Wapping ...,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Fifty-three single maps accompanied by engraved leaf (not included in pagination) with descriptive text; one map is on double plates.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
